CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 23, 1963, pg. 12 reads: "Honored - Pictured being collard by the Grand Exalted Ruler of Greater Pittsburgh Elks Lodge is Alice Holley Rose, recently appointed Grand Colonel of the Antler Guard Department. Among those present at a reception held in her honor at the Greater Pittsburgh Lodge, 639 Lincoln Ave., were (seated left) Col. Elenora Boykins, (Standing from left) Col. James Humbert, Gen. Edward Miles, brigadier general; Colonel Flewellan, Exalted Ruler of Greater Pittsburgh Lodge; Gen. Eley Randolph; the honoree, Col. Alice Holley Rose, vice president, Penn State Association; Col. Samuel Gray, Marion Charles, general chairman and captain of Queen Esther Marching Club, and Maj. Glen Jordon.  Seated, far right is Hester R. Thomas, state president. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Elks members, from left, seated: Elenora Boykins; standing: James Humbert, Edward Miles, Colonel Flewellan, Eley Randolph, Alice Holley Rose, being awarded with chain collar; Samuel Gray, Marion Charles, and Glen Jordon; seated: Hester R. Thomas, gathered at banquet table Six men and two women, members of the Greater Pittsburgh Elks, standing behind banquet table in the Greater Pittsburgh Lodge, 639 Lincoln Avenue, another version
